tool.name: OGS: GocadTSurfaceReader
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'GocadTSurfaceReader'.

param.name: write_binary
param.label: write binary
param.help: if set, OGS-Meshes will be written in binary format

param.name: surfaces_only
param.label: surfaces only
param.help: if set, only TSurf datasets will be parsed from the input file

param.name: lines_only
param.label: lines only
param.help: if set, only PLine datasets will be parsed from the input file

param.name: input_file
param.label: input file
param.help: Input (.ts | .pl | .mx). Gocad triangular surfaces file Provide a file with unix file endings under unix. Use dos2unix to convert.

tool.help: This tool runs the **GocadTSurfaceReader** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
